Release Notes

Version 0.0.2

Release Date: December 2024

This is a placeholder release while we prepare the full repo-sapiens package for release.

Features

  • Basic greeting functionality (greet, get_greeting)

  • Full type hints and docstrings

  • Comprehensive documentation

  • Package structure in place

Status

This release reserves the repo-sapiens package name and tests the PyPI distribution workflow. The complete automation suite will be available in the coming weeks.

Supported Python Versions

  • Python 3.8

  • Python 3.9

  • Python 3.10

  • Python 3.11

  • Python 3.12

Coming in Future Releases

Next Release (0.1.0)

  • Repository automation features

  • Configuration management system

  • Git integration utilities

  • Enhanced API design

Planned Features

  • Template rendering engine

  • Credential management system

  • CLI interface

  • Comprehensive automation workflows

Version 0.0.1

Initial placeholder release

Upgrading

To upgrade to the latest version:

pip install --upgrade repo-sapiens

Breaking Changes

Currently, no breaking changes between versions.

Known Issues

  • This is a placeholder release with minimal functionality

  • Full feature set not yet implemented

Feedback

Help shape the future of repo-sapiens:

  • Report Issues: https://github.com/savorywatt/repo-sapiens/issues

  • Request Features: https://github.com/savorywatt/repo-sapiens/issues/new

  • Contribute: See Contributing Guide

Migration Guide

Coming with the full release - will document any API changes between versions.

Security

If you discover a security vulnerability, please email the maintainers directly rather than using the public issue tracker.

Support Timeline

  • Version 0.0.x: Placeholder/testing releases

  • Version 0.1.0+: Full feature releases with support timeline to be determined

Next Steps

  • Check the Getting Started guide

  • Explore the Core Module API reference

  • Review the Overview for current features
